title_full: SAP20-BP01 Understand SAP licensing costs on AWS
title: Understand SAP licensing costs on AWS
description: Understand SAP licensing models and how they apply to AWS deployments. Consider Bring Your Own License (BYOL) versus license-included options, indirect access licensing implications, and SAP license measurement based on peak memory usage for HANA.

title_full: SAP20-BP02 Optimize SAP system landscape for cost efficiency
title: Optimize SAP system landscape for cost efficiency
description: Optimize your SAP system landscape to reduce costs by consolidating non-production systems, using shared infrastructure where appropriate, and decommissioning unused systems. Consider SAP landscape transformation options such as system copy and selective data migration.

title_full: SAP21-BP01 Select cost-effective compute resources for SAP workloads
title: Select cost-effective compute resources for SAP workloads
description: Select EC2 instance types that balance performance requirements with cost efficiency. Use newer generation instances that provide better price-performance ratios and consider Graviton-based instances for supported SAP workloads.

title_full: SAP21-BP02 Use Reserved Instances or Savings Plans for SAP workloads
title: Use Reserved Instances or Savings Plans for SAP workloads
description: Commit to Reserved Instances or Compute Savings Plans for production SAP workloads with predictable usage patterns. Analyze usage patterns to determine optimal commitment levels and regularly review reservations for optimization opportunities.

title_full: SAP21-BP03 Implement start/stop schedules for non-production SAP systems
title: Implement start/stop schedules for non-production SAP systems
description: Implement automated start/stop schedules for non-production SAP systems to reduce compute costs during non-working hours. Use AWS Instance Scheduler or custom automation with AWS Lambda and Amazon EventBridge to manage SAP system availability.

title_full: SAP22-BP01 Optimize storage costs for SAP workloads
title: Optimize storage costs for SAP workloads
description: Optimize storage costs by selecting appropriate EBS volume types, using gp3 volumes with configured IOPS and throughput, and implementing tiered storage strategies. Delete unused snapshots and volumes, and use lifecycle policies to manage backup retention.

title_full: SAP22-BP02 Implement data archiving for SAP systems
title: Implement data archiving for SAP systems
description: Implement SAP data archiving to reduce database size and storage costs. Use SAP Information Lifecycle Management (ILM) to archive historical data to cost-effective storage tiers such as Amazon S3 Glacier. Maintain compliance with data retention requirements.

title_full: SAP23-BP01 Continually optimize sizing and configuration based on performance data
title: Continually optimize sizing and configuration based on performance data
description: Continuously monitor SAP workload performance and adjust sizing based on actual utilization data. Use AWS Compute Optimizer and SAP performance monitoring to identify opportunities for right-sizing without impacting performance.

title_full: SAP23-BP02 Use AWS Cost Explorer and Cost Anomaly Detection for SAP workloads
title: Use AWS Cost Explorer and Cost Anomaly Detection for SAP workloads
description: Use AWS Cost Explorer to analyze SAP workload costs and identify optimization opportunities. Enable AWS Cost Anomaly Detection to receive alerts when costs deviate from expected patterns. Tag SAP resources for granular cost allocation and chargeback.

title_full: SAP24-BP01 Implement cost allocation tags for SAP workloads
title: Implement cost allocation tags for SAP workloads
description: Implement a consistent tagging strategy for SAP resources including System ID, environment type, cost center, and application owner. Activate cost allocation tags in AWS Billing to enable detailed cost analysis and chargeback reporting.
